definitions.definition: To speak in generalities , or in vague terms.
To infer or induce from specific cases to more general cases or principles.
To spread throughout the body and become systemic .
To derive or deduce (a general concept or principle) from particular facts.

main_definition: To speak in generalities , or in vague terms.
secondary_definitions: To infer or induce from specific cases to more general cases or principles.
To spread throughout the body and become systemic .
To derive or deduce (a general concept or principle) from particular facts.
